concept.title: Requesting and Cancelling Monitoring for a Process
concept.shortdesc: This tutorial describes how to request and cancel monitoring for a process.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Before monitoring a process, SHMA reads the following information from SSM:

li.p: file name of the process to be launched
execution behaviour (See TSsmExecutionBehaviour for more information)
time-out to wait for process to start before considering it as a failure
number of retries if an application or a process fails to start.

section.p: RSysMonSession is the client interface for SHMA.
